title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Lumbar Puncture Technical Simulation Training Based on Integrated Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy and foundational understanding of medical procedures
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can perform the six steps of lumbar puncture procedure with over 80% accuracy
Learners can explain each procedural step by linking it to its anatomical rationale
Learners apply techniques while adhering to over 90% safety standards in simulation environments
Learners demonstrate over 75% skill retention rate in assessments conducted at four-week intervals post-training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
